jasima.core.random.continuous

类 DblGamma

  • java.lang.Object
    • jasima.core.random.continuous.DblStream
      • jasima.core.random.continuous.DblDistribution
        • jasima.core.random.continuous.DblGamma
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class DblGamma
extends DblDistribution
    Implements a stream of real numbers where each value follows a Gamma distribution. The distribution is characterized by a shape and a scale parameter. It is a generalization of the Exponential and Erlang distributions.
    作者:
    Torsten Hildebrandt
    另请参阅:
    Gamma distribution (Wikipedia), Gamma distribution (MathWorld), 序列化表格
